benchmark_details.name: MultiEdit
benchmark_details.overview: MultiEdit is a comprehensive dataset for advancing instruction-based image editing, featuring over 107K samples across 6 challenging editing tasks, which includes 18 non-style-transfer editing types and 38 style transfer operations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a valuable resource that facilitates research into more diverse and challenging instruction-based image editing capabilities.

data.source: MultiEdit comprises samples collected from various image datasets, specifically designed to address complex editing tasks.
data.annotation: Generated using a multi-modal large language model context.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of models fine-tuned on the MultiEdit-Train set against the MultiEdit-Test benchmark.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance on the image editing tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Various models tested including Stable Diffusion and UltraEdit, with improvements noted post fine-tuning on the MultiEdit dataset.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments validate the dataset through comparisons with baseline models.
